comments.body: Hello Bitcointalk Community,We are excited to introduce the Blackjack.fun Beta Tournament, exclusively for the Bitcointalk Blackjack Legends. After a long development, we invite you to be part of this testing phase.How the Tournament Works:Once you sit down at the table, you'll be credited with 500 JACK tokens to play with. During the tournament, your goal is to accumulate as many JACK tokens as possible. At the end of the tournament, the player with the most JACK tokens will be selected as the winner.Key Details:Entry Fee: There's no entry fee for this tournament; it's open to all Bitcointalk users.Tournament Prize: The tournament offers a prize of 100 USD worth of BTC.Tournament Duration: 30 MinutesWinner: The player with the most JACK tokens at the end of the 30-minute tournament will be declared as the winner.Why You Should Participate:This tournament is an opportunity to showcase your blackjack skills, compete with fellow Bitcointalk members, and have a chance at winning significant prizes. It's also a chance to explore our platform's gaming features and share your feedback.How to Join:Visit Blackjack.funCreate your account if you haven't already.Join the tournament at the specified time (Beta Phase) to enjoy a challenging gaming experience.Future Plans: In the future, we plan to enhance the tournament by adding password protection, ensuring added exclusivity for the Bitcointalk community.Tournament Schedule:Tournament Date: dateDuration: 30 minutesDon't miss out on the opportunity to join the Blackjack.fun Beta Tournament. Have fun, compete, and aim for impressive wins. We can't wait to see you at the tables.Stay tuned for further updates and exciting developments.
